summary: A new retexture of ALL steel weapons making them better looking and adding ornate details.
descriptionHtml:
HD leather, wood and steel retextures for all the steel weapons.
Included swords, daggers, axes, arrows and the hunting bow.

Installation:
-UnRAR the content of the file downloaded.
-Copy it to your Data folder.
-Yes to replace.
-Enjoy it into the game!

Unistallation:
-Simply delete the file downloaded.

This is in my opinion my best mod so enjoy yourselves with it! ;)
author: Jargu Bulinguillo
